sourceDesc.p: Excerpt from: “Marie Curie, So Honorable Woman”, in Lydia Davis, The collected stories of Lydia Davis, Penguin, 2014.

body.p: Perhaps she did not speak of it, even for an instant, with the physicist she has been seeing for several weeks, and who has brought her the offprint of an article titled "On symmetry in physical phenomena, the symmetry of an electric field and of a magnetic field." The brochure is dedicated "To Mlle Sklodowska with the respect and the friendship of the author P. Pierre Curie."
Together they speak enormously, but about physics or themselves.
